title: Added profile editing and API improvements
content:
Introducing [profile editing](/edit), empowering members to manage their data on our site.

### Key features
* Significant API improvements
* Email verification using Firebase and Sendgrid
* Captcha using Cloudflare

title: Co-hosted a celebration for AANHPI Heritage Month
content:
Announcing the first-ever **Pasifika in Tech Bay Area Happy Hour**, co-hosted with several industry partners. The event showcased the vibrant Polynesian, Melanesian, and Micronesian tech community, fostering connections and amplifying Pasifika voices in the industry.

### Highlights of the event
* 80+ indigenous Pacific Islander and ally attendees
* Hosted at Twitch HQ in Downtown San Francisco
* Culturally-driven cuisine, creativity, and networking
* Representation from tech companies including Amazon, Google, Apple, Netflix, and more

title: Upgraded email templates with react-email
content: We updated our email communication to use [react-email](https://github.com/resend/react-email/) and Tailwind. This change allows us to deliver a more polished and professional email experience to our community members.

title: Added admin dashboard
content:
The new Admin dashboard gives community managers an interface for reviewing and approving members.

### Key features
* Streamlined process for approving new members and updating profiles
* Added email list for administrators

title: Co-hosted virtual event with ThriveHI
content:
We collaborated with ThriveHI to host a virtual event connecting kama'āina and kanaka throughout tech.

* Connected tech professionals in Hawaii and on the mainland
* Discussed culture, identity, and community building

title: Co-organized Hackathon with Purple Maiʻa
content:
The hackathon showcased the talent within our community and demonstrated how technology can be leveraged to address important cultural and social issues.

### Highlights of the event:
* Projects focused on Hawaiian language preservation, cultural education, and community resources
* 48-hour in-person & virtual hackathon
* Mentorship from experienced Native Hawaiian and ally tech professionals
